channel.title: Making anti-dragon fire shield work

item.title: Making anti-dragon fire shield work
item.dc:creator: @candree candree
item.description:
@candree wrote:

ok this is wut i declared and im not sure wuts wrong
it says there is an “else without if”


npcs[NPCID].actionTimer = 7;
} else if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 941 || npcs[NPCID].npcType == 55 || npcs[NPCID].npcType == 53 || npcs[NPCID].npcType == 54) {
npcs[NPCID].animNumber = 2062;

						if(plr.playerEquipment[playerShield] == 1540){
                                             	  hitDiff = 3-6 + misc.random(30);
						} else {
						 hitDiff = 2-10 + misc.random(30);
                                           		  p.stillgfx(1, p.absY + 5, p.absX);
						  plr.sendMessage("The dragons overwhelming heat from the flames 			scorch you!");
						}
                }
